addtestview.confidence_level_description: The confidence level dictates the amount of errors allowed. A higher percentage directly correlates to the accuracy of the test results. This denotes whether the difference measured between the control page and variant page is not by chance (i.e. significant).
addtestview.duration_header: For how long do you wish to run the A/B test?
addtestview.error_conversiongoal: You must select a conversion goal page before you can save the A/B test.
addtestview.error_conversionpage: You must select a conversion page before you can save the A/B test.
addtestview.error_date_in_the_past: The starting date/time of the test cannot be in the past.
addtestview.error_duration: Duration must be a valid integer between 1 and 365
addtestview.error_invalid_date_time_value: The information entered is not a valid date/time value
addtestview.error_participation_percentage: Participation percentage must be between 1 and 100
addtestview.error_test_not_schedulded_or_started: not scheduled, resolve starting date/time errors in order to schedule a test
addtestview.goals_default_text: Ex. By tweaking the copy in the first bullet point to directly address the ‘time issue’, I can motivate more visitors to download the ebook.
addtestview.goals_header: What is the overall goal for this test?
addtestview.notscheduled_text: not scheduled, and will start now
addtestview.participant_percentage_tip: A higher participation percentage reduces the time required to gather enough statistics to be able to pick a winner.
addtestview.participation_header: What percentage of visitors should participate in this A/B test?
addtestview.schedule_header: When should the A/B test be started?
addtestview.test_description: Validate if any new addition or change to content will actually improve the conversion rate.

admin.description: These settings are the defaults values used for when creating AB tests.
admin.invalid: One or more values are not of the correct format.

archiveview.content_chosen: , and content has been chosen to publish
archiveview.percent_participation_header: Percentage of visitors participating in this A/B test

canceltestcommand.label_text: Cancel A/B test and edit page
canceltestcommand.tooltip_text: Cancel A/B test and edit page

detailsview.percent_participation_header: Percentage of visitors participating in this A/B test
detailsview.test_not_started_text: This test has not yet started.
detailsview.test_status_completed: Test completed, now go on and pick a winner...

notificationbar.completed_test: An A/B test was completed on a version of this content.
notificationbar.ongoing_test: A version of this content is part of a running A/B test.
notificationbar.scheduled_test: An A/B test is scheduled to run on a version of this content
notificationbar.version_in_test: A version of this content is part of an ongoing A/B test.
notificationbar.winner_link_tooltip: View test details and pick winner

pickwinnerview.early_pick_winner_message: This test has not been completed, but you may pick a winner. Picking a winner now will end the test and publish the chosen content.
pickwinnerview.percent_participation_header: Percentage of visitors participating in this A/B test
pickwinnerview.result_is_not_significant: The results of this test are NOT significant.
pickwinnerview.result_is_significant: The results of this test are significant.
pickwinnerview.test_not_started_text: This test has not yet started.
pickwinnerview.test_status_completed: Test completed, now go on and pick a winner...

publishing.error_cannot_publish: You cannot publish content while it is being tested. To publish your content, choose a winner or cancel the current test.
publishing.error_cannot_schedule_publish: You cannot schedule content to be published while it is being tested. To schedule your content to be published, choose a winner or cancel the current test.

scheduler_plugin.description: Scans the list of pending or active Marketing tests and changes the test state based on the Start Date and End Date for the test.
